title: The First Time Homesteader & Things I’d Do Differently w/ Jess Sowards
itunes:title: The First Time Homesteader & Things I’d Do Differently w/ Jess Sowards
description: Learn the three most common homesteading mistakes people make when embarking on their homesteading journey. And learn a few tips to keep your focus where it will have the best impact. In this episode, I’m talking with Jess Sowards from Roots & Refuge Farm and she’s sharing her first-time homesteading wisdom, especially as she and her husband build their forever homestead from scratch on bare land in South Carolina. For all of the show notes and links, visit https://melissaknorris.com/362.
